Package database

Class PhotoAppDb

  • java.lang.Object
    • database.PhotoAppDb
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    public class PhotoAppDb
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class simulates a real word database connectivity As We do not have a real database, so this will act as a database using which we can update / store our data. It basically is a in memory database.
    Author:
    Dev Patel and Eric Chan
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • addTagType

        public void addTagType​(java.lang.String tagKey,
                       boolean singleValueTag)
        Method to create a new tag type. These are general tags and not owned by a specific user
        Parameters:
        tagKey - Name for the tag
        singleValueTag - : whether the tag can contain only one value or multiple

      • addTagType

        public void addTagType​(java.lang.String tagKey,
                       boolean singleValueTag,
                       User u)
        Method to create a new tag type owned by a specific user
        Parameters:
        tagKey - Name for the tag
        singleValueTag - : whether the tag can contain only one value or multiple
        u - : owner of the tag type.

      • getAlbumsForUser

        public java.util.ArrayList<Album> getAlbumsForUser​(User currentUser)
        Return the list of albums for given user
        Parameters:
        currentUser - User object for currently logged user
        Returns:
        List of albums, empty list if no albums for the user

        public Album findAlbumWithName​(User currentUser,
                               java.lang.String albumName)
        Method to find the album onwed by a specific user and having the specific name
        Parameters:
        currentUser - User object for currently logged user
        albumName - Album name to find
        Returns:
        album object, null if no album is found with given criteria

      • findTagWithName

        public Tag findTagWithName​(java.lang.String tagKey,
                           User u)
        Method to find the tag object with tag name and owner of the tag
        Parameters:
        tagKey - Name of tag
        u - User who owns the tag
        Returns:
        tag object, null if nothing found

      • getAllTags

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getAllTags​(User u)
        Get all the tag names which are possible for a given user. it contains both user owned as well as general tags like location and persosn.
        Parameters:
        u - User whose tags need to be found
        Returns:
        List of tag names

      • getUserOwnerTags

        public java.util.List<Tag> getUserOwnerTags​(User u)
        Get all the tag names which are owned by a given user. it does not contain general tags like location and persosn.
        Parameters:
        u - User whose tags need to be found
        Returns:
        List of tag names

      • getLastSearchedDir

        public java.lang.String getLastSearchedDir()
        Get the last directory where user searched for photos. For the first time, it defaults to user home directory,
        Returns:
        the path of directory

      • setLastSearchedDir

        public void setLastSearchedDir​(java.lang.String lastSearchedDir)
        Set the directory path where user searched at last for adding the pics
        Parameters:
        lastSearchedDir - Directory path to be set

      • getPicIndexInAlbum

        public int getPicIndexInAlbum​(Album album,
                              Photo currentPic)
        Get the index of the pic in the parent album. Each album contains multiple pictures.
        Parameters:
        album - Album in which photo needs to be searched
        currentPic - photo which needs to be searched
        Returns:
        The pic index

      • getPhotosForUser

        public java.util.ArrayList<Photo> getPhotosForUser​(User currentUser)
        Get the list of photos owned by the given user
        Parameters:
        currentUser - User object for currently logged user
        Returns:
        Empty list if user has no photos, else list of photos

      • getUsersExceptCurrent

        public java.util.List<User> getUsersExceptCurrent​(User currentUser)
        Get the list of users existing in the system except the current user.
        Parameters:
        currentUser - User object for currently logged user
        Returns:
        list of users

      • removeUser

        public void removeUser​(User u)
        Method to remove a specific user from the system. On removing the user, its albums and owned tags are removed as well
        Parameters:
        u - User object to remove

      • removeTag

        public void removeTag​(Tag t)
        Method to remove the tag. It also removes the tag from the photos if photos has that tag
        Parameters:
        t - Tag object to be removed.
